com.xmlmind.util
Class JarUtil

java.lang.Object
  com.xmlmind.util.JarUtil

public final class JarUtil
extends Object

A collection of utility functions (static methods) operating on JARs.

Method Summary

          Returns the URLs of the JARs listed in the Class-Path attribute of the manifest of a JAR.

          Returns the Class-Path attribute of the manifest of a JAR.

Method Detail

getClassPath

public static URL[] getClassPath(URL jarURL)
                          throws IOException
Returns the URLs of the JARs listed in the Class-Path attribute of the manifest of a JAR.

Parameters:
jarURL - the URL of the JAR
Returns:
the URLs of the JARs listed in the Class-Path attribute of the manifest or an empty array if the manifest or the Class-Path attribute were not found.
Throws:
IOException

getClassPathAttribute

public static String getClassPathAttribute(URL jarURL)
                                    throws IOException
Returns the Class-Path attribute of the manifest of a JAR.

Parameters:
jarURL - the URL of the JAR
Returns:
the Class-Path attribute of the manifest if any; null otherwise.
Throws:
IOException

getServiceProviders

public static String[] getServiceProviders(URL jarURL)
                                    throws IOException
Returns the service providers found in a JAR.

Parameters:
jarURL - the URL of the JAR
Returns:
a list of triplets:
  • service name (fully qualified interface name),
  • service implementor (fully qualified class name),
  • end of line comment after service implementor if any or null otherwise,
      or an empty array if the JAR contains no service providers.
      Throws:
      IOException
